content: + media title 1 learn how to crochet this super easy basket made with scrap yarn project notes i used up leftover scraps of bernat blanket yarn for this basket creating 2 balls or you can easily use 2 balls of blanket yarn with 2 strands held together 9 0 mm crochet hook finished basket measures approximately 11 base x 9 5 height 1 https //youtu be/iidctq_sghc
